data.name: Dumbbell Squats
data.description: Start with dumbbells at your sides and feet just outside of hip width.. Sit your hips down and back,, let your shoulders come forward,, while keeping your back flat.. Push the ground away to stand.

data.name: Lower Back Stretch
data.description: Hug your left knee up towards your chest and pull it across your body with your right hand.  As you breathe out let your left arm drape on the floor as your work deeper into the stretch

data.name: Hurdle Steps
data.description: From a tall standing position, bring one leg out to the side of your body,, until that thigh is parallel to the ground.. Bring your leg inwards,, and quickly snap down.. Alternate legs to repeat..

data.name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Press
data.description: With your left leg forward, press the weight up with your left arm. Help brace your core by putting your right hand on your hip. Drive your left arm straight up over your head and lower back down slowly.

data.name: Side Lying T Stretch
data.description: Lying on your left side lift your knees up even with your hips.  Reach and rotate your right arm back while your eyes follow your hand.  Return back to the center.

data.name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Bench Press
data.description: Grab one dumbbell and lay on a bench.  With your palm forward press the dumbbell straight up.  Lower under control just before it touches your shoulder and punch up.

data.name: Butterfly Stretch
data.description: Sit with your knees out and soles of your feet together.. Keep a tall torso as you lean your chest forward,, and push your knees apart with your elbows. Breathe deeply.

data.name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Press
data.description: With your right leg forward, press the weight up with your left arm. Help brace your core by putting your left hand on your hip. Drive your right arm straight up over your head and lower back and down slowly.

data.name: Elevated 1 Dumbbell Split Squat
data.description: Holding two dumbbells, start in a lunge position with your right leg elevated on a bench or box and your left leg forward. Squat down and come back up

data.name: Dumbbell Waiter's Carry
data.description: Start with the dumbbell in your left hand,, with your elbow at ninety degrees and your forearm vertical.. Keep a tall torso as you walk forward,, careful not lean to either side..

data.name: Racked Barbell Reverse Lunge
data.description: With the bar in the racked position,, reach your right leg back,, and drop down into a lunge.. Drive your left foot into the ground to finish standing tall,, with your right knee and toe up..

data.name: Racked Barbell Reverse Lunge
data.description: With the bar in the racked position,, reach your left leg back,, and drop down into a lunge.. Drive your right foot into the ground to finish standing tall,, with your left knee and toe up.

data.name: A-Skips
data.description: Skip while driving opposite arm and leg.  Stay light and springy

data.name: Lateral Hip Openers
data.description: In a wide stance, slide side to side and push your hips back.

data.name: Elevated Dumbbell Split Squat
data.description: Start with your right foot on the box behind you with your laces down. Your left leg is on the floor in front of you. Your left knee should reach a ninety degree bend as you lower down.

data.name: Kettlebell Front Squats
data.description: Rack two kettlebells on your shoulders. Squat back and down with your knees out and a flat back.  Drive back up.

data.name: Step-Up Knee Drives
data.description: Standing in front of a box,, step up with one foot,, with your weight in your front leg,, drive the box through the ground,, simultaneously sweep the back leg up to reach the hip lock position on the push leg,, bring your toes up and knee up on the drive leg,, reverse the movement and repeat with the opposite leg.

data.name: Quick Feet Forward and Back
data.description: Start in an athletic stance. Quickly jump forward and back over an imaginary line.

data.name: Modified High Plank
data.description: Place your hands on an elevated surface and set up in a high plank position,, keep your body in a straight line and core tight to hold this position.

data.name: Lower Back Stretch
data.description: Hug your right knee up towards your chest and pull it across your body with your right hand.  As you breathe out let your right arm drape on the floor.

data.name: Knee Hugs
data.description: Stand tall. Lift and hug your knee into your chest.  Hold for 2 seconds and then switch sides

data.name: Low Plank
data.description: Lay on the ground. Raise up on both elbows and feet.  Maintain perfect posture, engage your abs, and hold.

data.name: Med Ball Rotational Slams
data.description: Reach a medicine ball to the ceiling.  With one powerful swoop, slam the ball down at your side as you drop into an athletic stance.  Have your hands ready to catch the ball on its way back up.  Reach back up and slam on the other side

data.name: Forward Lunges
data.description: Stay tall as you take a big step forward,, and drop down until just before your back knee touches.. Push the ground away to stand,, and switch legs to repeat..

data.name: Cable Chest Press
data.description: Stand tall with handles at chest height, facing away from the machine.. With a neutral grip, press the handles away from your chest,, straight out in front of you. Your arms are parallel to the ground.. Return under control.

data.name: Walking Lunges
data.description: From a standing position take a big step forward. Drop your back knee just above the ground and then drive up to a standing position.

data.name: Side Lying T Stretch
data.description: Lying on your right side lift your knees up even with your hips. Reach and rotate your left arm back while your eyes follow your hand. Return back to the center.

data.name: Stability Ball Single-Leg Curl
data.description: Place your right foot on the stability ball.  The left leg is in at 90 degrees.  With your palms pressing into the ground, bridge up and curl the ball in.  Slowly lower back out with the other leg until your leg is fully extended.  Do all the reps on one leg and then switch.

data.name: Plank Alternating Leg Lifts
data.description: Start in a low plank position with your forearms on the ground. Lift one leg up a few inches off the ground. Hold for a second and slowly lower down. Repeat on the opposite leg

data.name: Med Ball Push-Ups
data.description: Start in push-up position with one hand on the ball. Perform a push-up with one hand on the ball, when you get to the top, roll the ball to the other hand and repeat

data.name: Single-Leg Dumbbell Rows
data.description: With a dumbbell on the ground and a bench or box to hold onto for support, stand on your left leg and hinge forward with your torso while keeping your right leg parallel to the ground. Grab the dumbbell with your left hand.  Pull it up, squeeze, and then lower until your arm is straight.

data.name: Stability Ball 2 Up-1 Down Leg Curls
data.description: Place your heels on a stability ball.  With your palms pressing into the ground, bridge up and curl the ball in with both legs.  Pause and lift one leg off the ball.  Slowly lower back out with the other leg until your leg is fully extended.  Switch legs each rep.
data.synonyms: Stability Ball 2 Up 1 Down Leg Curls

data.name: V-Up
data.description: With arms overhead and feet on the floor, dynamically fold up and touch your shoes.  Unfold and let your feet go to the ground each rep.  If this is too intense, fold up with your opposite arm and opposite leg

data.name: Agility Run
data.description: Start in an athletic position,, push the ground away as you accelerate towards your target,, when you get to your target, plant your legs and turn around,, sprint back to the start.

data.name: Single-Leg Dumbbell Rows
data.description: With a dumbbell on the ground and a bench or box to hold onto for support, stand on your right leg and hinge forward with your torso while keeping your left leg parallel to the ground. Grab the dumbbell with your right hand.  Pull it up, squeeze, and then lower until your arm is straight.

data.name: Lateral Step-Ups
data.description: Start with a box at your left side,, and your left foot on top.. Drive your foot into the box to stand tall,, with your right knee and toe up.. Pause, then lower down under control..

data.name: Drop Squats
data.description: From a standing position with your hands up, jump your feet apart and drop into a squat as your hands swipe behind you. Do this as quickly as possible and land soft and stable.  Stand back up and repeat.

data.name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Split Squat
data.description: Start with your right knee down,, and your left shin vertical.. Hold the dumbbell in your left arm,, and stay tall as you stand straight up.. Lower until your knee almost touches,, then stand back up..

data.name: Dumbbell Incline Bench Press
data.description: Adjust the incline bench up two notches.. Lay back on the bench,, with a dumbbell in each hand.. Press the dumbbells towards the ceiling.. Lower down under control,, keeping your elbows tucked..

data.name: Side Lying Quadriceps Stretch
data.description: Lie on your right side with your hips stacked,, and your body straight.. Grab your left foot with your left hand,, and pull towards your butt.. You should feel a stretch in the front of your left thigh..

data.name: Explosive Push-Ups
data.description: In a push-up position, lower down slowly and explode up as hard as possible, lifting your hands off the floor.

data.name: Plank Saws
data.description: Start in a low plank position.. Shift your weight forward on your toes,, to move your body out over your elbows,, then push back.. Pulse back and forth,, while keeping your body in a straight line..

data.name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Split Squat
data.description: Start with your left knee down,, and your right shin vertical.. Hold the dumbbell in your right arm,, and stay tall as you stand straight up.. Lower until your knee almost touches,, then stand back up..

data.name: Resistance Band Front Raise
data.description: Stand with both feet on the center of the band, hip width apart. Keeping your arms fully extended, raise your arms up and straight out in front of you. Raise your arms to shoulder height

data.name: Treadmill Jog
data.description: Set the treadmill to a jogging pace

data.name: Shoeshine
data.description: In an athletic stance with a soft knee bend, alternate arms and throw jabs, rotate your arms as you punch out.

data.name: Jump Rope
data.description: Jump with both of your feet at the same time, spending as little time on the floor as possible.  Move the rope with your wrists not the entire arm.

data.name: Mountain Climbers
data.description: Start in a high plank position, stay on the balls of your feet and alternate driving each knee to your chest while keeping your upper body stable.

data.name: Lateral Shuffle
data.description: In an athletic stance with knees bent and hips back, take 3 to 5 shuffles in one direction and then shuffle back.

data.name: Cable Rotational Press
data.description: Stand tall with the handle at chest height and the cable machine to your left.. With your hands together, press the handle away from your chest,, straight out in front of you. Keep a strong base of support with your legs.

data.name: Figure Four Stretch
data.description: Put your left ankle against your right knee.  Use both hands to pull your legs back toward you.  Focus on rotating your left knee out to feel a greater stretch on the lateral hip.

data.name: Kettlebell Goblet Squats
data.description: Grab the kettlebell by the horns and snap it up to your chest.  Wear it like a superman logo and drop into a squat with hips back and chest up.  Drive up to standing

data.name: Dumbbell Front Squat to Bench
data.description: Place the dumbbells on top of your shoulders,, with your elbows pointing forward.. Keep your chest up,, as you sit down and back to the bench.. Gently touch, then stand back up..

data.name: Elliptical
data.description: Hop on an elliptical

data.name: Quick Feet In Place
data.description: In an athletic stance with your hips back and knees bent, alternate tapping your feet as fast as possible. Think light and quick.

data.name: Kneeling Quadriceps Stretch
data.description: Kneel on the floor with your right leg forward and left leg back.  With perfect posture, press your hips forward until your feel a stretch in the front of your left thigh.

data.name: Inchworms
data.description: Fold over and place your hands on the ground.  Taking small steps with your hands, walk out into a plank position.  While keeping your legs straight, walk your feet up to your hands.

data.name: Suspension Tricep Press
data.description: Grab the handles with your arms completely extended and your feet a few inches behind your hips. Bring your arms up to ninety degrees and press back to fully extending them

data.name: Alternating Split Jumps
data.description: In a lunge stance, jump up, switch legs in mid-air, and then land back in a lunge.

data.name: Reverse Alternating Dumbbell Lunges
data.description: With dumbbells at your sides in a standing position, step one leg back and drop that knee just above the ground.  In one strong motion press back up to a standing position.

data.name: Dumbbell Step-Ups
data.description: Drive your foot into the box or bench until you reach a full standing position.  Sink your hips back and lower under control to the start

data.name: Lying Hamstring Stretch
data.description: Lying flat on the ground, pull your right leg to your chest while keeping a slight bend in your knee.  Keep your left leg straight and pressed into the ground.

data.name: Standing Quadriceps Stretch
data.description: Start with your feet together,, and reach your left hand back to grab your left foot.. Pull your heel into your butt,, and stand tall on your right leg.. You should feel a stretch in your left quadriceps..

data.name: Hollow Body Hold
data.description: Lie down flat on your back and contract the abs, pulling the belly button towards the floor. The arms and legs should be held straight out from the body with hands and toes pointed. Slowly raise shoulders and legs from the ground. The arms and head should be raised along with the shoulders. Now move lower your arms to your body and then back up again.

data.name: Barbell Front Squat
data.description: Place the barbell high on your shoulders and let it rest on your fingertips.  Starting with your feet just wider than your hips, squat back and down.  Drive up to a standing position.

data.name: Leg Balance with Toe Reach
data.description: Start in an athletic position and balance on your left leg,, reach your right leg out to the side while maintaining balance your left leg,, return your right leg back and repeat.

data.name: Bicep Curls
data.description: With dumbbells starting at your sides and palms forward, curl toward your shoulders and squeeze.  Lower your back down until your arms are straight.

data.name: Dumbbell Tricep Extension
data.description: With palms facing in, bend your elbows and lower the dumbbells just behind your head. Press up using your triceps.

data.name: Side Plank
data.description: Position your left elbow beneath your left shoulder.  Stack your feet together and lift up off of the ground. Hold strong with your body in a straight line.

data.name: Side Plank Dumbbell Reverse Flys
data.description: Start in a side plank with your right arm on the ground,, and your left arm extended holding a dumbbell [short pause]Keep your arm extended and slowly lower,, before raising back up..

data.name: Foam Roll Glute
data.description: Sit on the foam roll.  Tilt your body to one side and place your elbow on the ground.  Massage your glute and the outside of your hip.

data.name: Reverse Crunch Hip Lifts
data.description: Start with knees bent at 90 degrees and feet on the floor.  Draw your knees in, straight your legs to vertical, and lift your hips of the floor.  Repeat down in reverse sequence.

data.name: Reverse Lunge Reaches
data.description: Step back and drop down with your knee hovering just above the ground.  On the side that stepped back, reach your arm up to the ceiling.

data.name: Highland Jacks
data.description: Start with your feet and arms together. Perform a jumping jack but instead of bringing your hands up, swing them out to the side.  Bring everything back together.  Stay light and on the balls of your feet and find a rhythmic motion.

data.name: Assisted Single-Leg Squat
data.description: Stand in front of a box or bench,, with most of your weight on your left leg,, and your right foot lightly touching the ground.. Reach back, and slowly sit down.. Now push your left foot into the ground to stand back up.

data.name: Sprinter Crunch
data.description: With arms overhead and feet on the floor, crunch up off the floor and bring your elbow and opposite knee together.  Unfold and switch sides

data.name: Chin-Ups
data.description: Start with both hands grabbing a pull-up bar with your palms facing yourself. Pull your chest up to the bar with your chin passing the bar

data.name: Kneeling Quadriceps Stretch
data.description: Kneel on the floor with your left leg forward and right leg back.  With perfect posture, press your hips forward until your feel a stretch in the front of your right thigh.

data.name: Elevated Split Squats
data.description: Place your left leg on the floor in front of you and your right foot on the box behind you with your laces facing down. Your left knee should reach a ninety degree bend as you lower yourself down.

data.name: Flying Shoulder Presses
data.description: Start lying face down with your hands next to your head and arms at a ninety degree angle. Lift your upper body and extend your arms out as far as you can

data.name: Base Rotation
data.description: In an athletic stance with your hips back and knees bent, rotate your feet to 10 o'clock and 2 o'clock as quick as you can.

data.name: Alternating Cable Split Pulldown
data.description: Start in a half-kneeling position with cables set high and a handle in each hand.. Draw one arm back,, bringing your elbow just past your ribs.. Return under control and repeat on the other side.

data.name: Single-Arm Cable Chest Press
data.description: Start in a split stance with your left foot back,, holding the handle at chest height with your left hand.. Stay tall as you punch your left arm forward.. Lower back under control..

data.name: Single-Arm Cable Chest Press
data.description: Start in a split stance with your right foot back,, holding the handle at chest height with your right hand.. Stay tall as you punch your right arm forward.. Lower back under control..

data.name: Kettlebell Deadlift
data.description: Start with the kettlebell between your feet.. Hinge your hips back to grab the kettlebell in both hands,, keeping your back flat and core tight.. Drive your heels into the ground to stand up..

data.name: Standing Hamstring Stretch
data.description: Start with your feet together,, and reach your right leg forward.. Dig that heel into the ground with your front leg straight,, and reach forward while keeping a tall torso.

data.name: Stability Ball Stir the Pot
data.description: Start in a low plank with your forearms on the ball.. Keep your core tight and body in a straight line,, as you rotate your shoulders to create a circle.. Finish the circle,, and switch directions.

data.name: Tricep Dips
data.description: Start with your arms extended and hands on the edge of the bench. You feet should be resting on your heels. Lower down until your upper arms are parallel with the floor, push back up by straightening your arms. To increase the difficulty, put your feet up on a second bench.

data.name: 90 Degree Rotational Jumps
data.description: Squat down with your hips back and your knees out. Jump up and rotate 90 degrees. Jump back up and rotate back to the start.

data.name: Rotational Plate Lift
data.description: Grab a weight plate or dumbbell and squat down with hips back.  Reach the weight just outside your right knee.  In one motion, rotate, pull the weight into your chest, turn and press the weight out above your shoulders. Return to the start

data.name: 3 Position Isometric Hold Push-Ups
data.description: Start in the top of a pushup position. Lower a quarter of the way down and hold. Next, lower to half way down and hold. Finally, hold with your nose just above the ground.

data.name: Resistance Band Tricep Extension
data.description: Stand with one foot slightly in front of the other and place the center of the band under the back foot. Bring the working arm up above the top of your head. Slowly lower the handle behind the back of your head until your elbow is bent to 90 degrees, keeping elbows close to the side of your head. Press hands back up overhead.

data.name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Incline Bench Press
data.description: Grab one dumbbell and lay on an incline bench.  With your palm forward press the dumbbell straight up.  Lower under control just before it touches your shoulder and punch up.

data.name: Elevated Dumbbell Split Squat
data.description: Put your left foot on the box behind you with your laces down. Your right leg is on the floor in front of you. Your right knee should reach a ninety degree bend as you lower down.

data.name: Feet Elevated Pushups
data.description: Elevate your feet on a box or bench.  Keeping your core tight, lower down and then drive back up.

data.name: Foam Roll Lat
data.description: Place the roller under your armpit.  Tilt to one side and raise that arm overhead.  With hips off the ground and both feet planted roll from your armpit down to mid torso.

data.name: Staggered Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift
data.description: Start in staggered stance so your right leg is forward.. Keep the majority of your weight on your right leg,, as you hinge your hips back and let your shoulders forward.. Pull your hips forward to stand..

data.name: Standing T Chest Stretch
data.description: Reach both arms out in front of you with palms up.  Stretch them apart into a T position.  Hold for two seconds and come back to the center
